Can you attach a test class file? Thanks.

Created an attachment (id=65075)
Patch for JDT/Core

You need to apply the patch on JDT/Core HEAD in order to get the ClassFormatException.
Get the boggus .class file from the attachment in bug 182154.
See bug 182154 comment 14, in order to know what class file to open.
Let me know if you don't get it.
